name: Blueberry Coffee Cake - Single Serve
description: This blueberry coffee cake has Blueberry coconut milk yogurt in it for the gorgeous color, and a coconut oil, cinnamon and Oat crumb.
recipeIngredient: 1 Tablespoon Oat flour (I usually use freshly ground old fashioned Oats)
1 Tablespoon wheat flour or Oat flour for gf
1 Tablespoon ground raw cashew or almond
1.5 Tablespoons So Delicious Blueberry Greek Yogurt + 1/2 teaspoon almond milk Or 2 Tablespoons So Delicious Blueberry regular yogurt.
1/2 teaspoon organic canola oil or coconut oil
1 Tablespoons raw sugar (ground or to taste)
a generous pinch of spices of choice
1.5 Tablespoons Oats flour or any flour of choice
a generous pinch of cinnamon or other spices of choice
2 teaspoons raw sugar ground (1 teaspoon more if you like it sweeter (or use vegan brown sugar))

recipeInstructions.text: In a ramekin, mix all the dry ingredients for the cake (except blueberries if using).
recipeInstructions.name: In a ramekin, mix all the dry ingredients for the cake (except blueberries if using).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wet ingredients and mix until well combined. Add blueberries and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wet ingredients and mix until well combined. Add blueberries and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a spoon to even out the thick batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a spoon to even out the thick batter.

recipeInstructions.text: For the crumb, mix all the dry ingredients, then add coconut oil. Using your hand, mix all the ingredients till the coconut oil is well distributed. Dont over mix as the oil will start to melt.
recipeInstructions.name: For the crumb, mix all the dry ingredients, then add coconut oil. Using your hand, mix all the ingredients till the coconut oil is well distributed. Dont over mix as the oil will start to melt.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the crumb on top of the cake batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the crumb on top of the cake batter.

itemListElement.text: Microwave on high for 1 minute (60-65 seconds).
itemListElement.name: Microwave on high for 1 minute (60-65 seconds).

itemListElement.text: Bake at preheated 365 degrees F for 15-18 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bake at preheated 365 degrees F for 15-18 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Dig in after cooling for half a minute!
itemListElement.name: Dig in after cooling for half a minute!

keywords: microwave cake, one serve cake, vegan cake recipe
